MiscMetabar 0.22
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

MiscMetabar

MiscMetabar package

accu_plot()

Plot accumulation curves for phyloseq-class object

add_dna_to_phyloseq()

Add dna in refseq slot of a physeq object using taxa names and renames taxa using ASV_1, ASV_2, …

all_object_size()

List the size of all object of the GlobalEnv.

as_binary_otu_table()

Transform the otu_table of a phyloseq-class object into a phyloseq-class object with à binary otu_table.

asv2otu()

Recluster sequences of an object of class physeq (e.g. OTUs or ASV from dada)

blast_to_phyloseq()

Blast some sequence against refseq slot of a phyloseq-class object.

data_fungi

Some fungal OTU in phyloseq format

data_fungi_sp_known

Some fungal OTU in phyloseq format with known species name

dist_bycol()

Compute paired distances among matrix (e.g. otu_table)

dist_pos_control()

Calculate ecological distance among positive controls vs distance for all samples

hill_phyloseq()

Graphical representation of hill number 0, 1 and 2 accross a factor

hill_tuckey_phyloseq()

Calculate hill number and compute Tuckey post-hoc test

krona()

Make Krona files using KronaTools.

lulu_phyloseq()

(Lulu)https://github.com/adrientaudiere/lulu reclustering of class physeq (forked from https://github.com/tobiasgf/lulu). See https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-017-01312-x for more information on the method.

multiplot()

Multiple plot function

otu_circle()

Plot OTU circle for phyloseq-class object

phyloseq_to_edgeR()

Convert phyloseq OTU count data into DGEList for edgeR package

physeq_heat_tree()

Heat tree from metacoder package using tax_table slot

plot_deseq2_phyloseq()

Plot DESeq2 results for a phyloseq or a DESeq2 object.

plot_edgeR_phyloseq()

Plot edgeR results for a phyloseq or a edgeR object.

plot_mt()

Plot the result of a mt test (mt)

sankey_phyloseq()

Sankey plot of phyloseq-class object

simplify_taxo()

Simplify taxonomy by removing some unused character such as "k__"

subset_taxa_tax_control()

Subset taxa using a taxa control (e.g. truffle root tips) through 3 methods.

summary_plot_phyloseq()

Summarise a phyloseq-class object using a plot.

tax_datatable()

Make a datatable with the taxonomy of a phyloseq-class object

track_wkflow()

Track the number of reads (= sequences), samples and cluster (e.g. ASV) from various objects including dada-class and derep-class.

venn_phyloseq()

Venn diagram of phyloseq-class object

vsearch_search_global()

Search for a list of sequence in a fasta file against physeq reference sequences using vsearch

write_phyloseq()

Save phyloseq object in the form of multiple csv tables.

Contents

Developed by Adrien Taudière.
